Name: Compatible for Fitbit Charge 2 Bands, VOMA Genuine Leather Replacement Wristband Strap for Fitbit Charge 2 HR Women Men
Description: Buckle closure Replacement Leather Watch Band for Fitbit Charge 2. Tactile and Tough: Made of top genuine leather with stainless steel buckle. Fits for wrist size : 5.5" - 8.1" . Replacement Band Only. The Fitbit Tracker is not included. Warranty: One year free replacement warranty or refund without return.   Perfect for your Fitbit Charge 2, turns your fitness tracker band into a fashion statement. Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 19, 2022 Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ voma ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09Y8YHM3B

QAs.Question: Is this compatible with the Charge 3??
QAs.Answer: Hello, I can't answer this question because my bracelet model is Charge2. But what I read in the fitbit community is that the bracelets are NOT COMPATIBLE. Hope this helps..

QAs.Question: How wide is the band??
QAs.Answer: I have the Charge 3 and the band is 3/4" wide..

QAs.Question: Is this as long ,or longer than the original Fitbit band??

Reviews.Comment: Whatever material it is made from, made my wrist break out in a horrible rash. Dermatologist recommended throwing it away, which is what I did..
Great quality and classy. Thank you..

I love the look and feel of this band! However, it is extremely difficult to remove from the watch. I was trying to put a lot of pressure on the push down part that is supposed to release it but it didn't budge. I've found that bending one side up a lot then pressing down on the other side will finally get it off..
Not happy at all. It says leather not leather at all!!! Do not reccomend!.
